english.segment1: Son of God. Shaper of the stars. You alone. The dweller of my heart. Mighty King. How beautiful You are, how beautiful
english.segment2: Son of God. The Father's gift to us. You alone. Were broken on the alter of love. Precious Lamb. Our freedom's in Your blood, It's in your blood
english.segment3: Jesus, Oh Holy One. I sing to You. Forgiven. Savior, I'm overcome. With Your great love for me
english.segment4: Son of God. Strenghth beyond compare. You alone. The darkness cannot bear. Lord of love. Your kindness draws me near, it draws me
english.segment5: Son of God. Prophecy of old. You alone. Redeemer of my soul. Come again. And lead your people home, come lead us home
english.segment6: You are worthy. You are worthy. You are worthy of all my praise
english.segment7: You are beautiful. You are beautiful. I will lift up my hands and sing
